Entry.JapaneseText: はぁ〜、きんにいらねぇだ！ おんもしろくねぇだ！ このピリピリした空気感、おらの出番がねーだよ
Entry.EnglishText: What's with this place? All white, sparkly and unepic no matter how you look at it, I say! I don't want to come out!

Entry.JapaneseText: そりゃ、緊張感も大事だぁ。 んだども、ここまで張り詰めてたら気が重いっつーの
Entry.EnglishText: And the air of tension is growing thick. It almost makes you feel bummed down just being here!

Entry.JapaneseText: ふくろだぬきぐらい能天気なら楽チンだが、 おらはナイーブな方だで、空気が読める男だよ
Entry.EnglishText: I know that things are going to get ugly soon. I am a man that can read a situation well.

Entry.JapaneseText: そったらこっで、このまま<Mel><Mel>のポケットで 大人しくしてるのが一番だぁ
Entry.EnglishText: That's why the only smart thing is to stay inside <Mel>-<Mel>'s pocket!

Entry.JapaneseText: ま、まさか、おらの出番はここまでで、 もう日の光を浴びられないなんてことに……
Entry.EnglishText: Wait...! Maybe this IS the place to have my fantastic entrance with all this sparkly crap!

Entry.JapaneseText: んーなバカな話、あるわけねぇ！ おらが出ないっつーことは、芋のないカレーと同じだ
Entry.EnglishText: What kind of silly things am I thinking!? Even if I didn't come out those two will be doing just fine.
